title: Pixel 1 Restarting Several times
content:
Hi! I'm AbdulRehman from Pakistan. I have Google's Pixel 1,but my phone disturbing me a lot. Sometimes its sound vanishes on plugging in wired handsfree. Sometimes it restarts without any warning or sometimes says "Process System not Responding" or "System UI has stopped working"
Then it restarts but stuck on loading then I have to press power button for long time to restart.
But it restarts again and again.
I went to safe mood but there every thing is fine. No problem there.
I've deleted all suspected apps and also hard reset and factory reseted my phone but nothing is working.
I request you to help me.
